data.title: PadmaSri Kamal Haasan-The Ultimate God Father of Indian Cinema
data.meta_description: 1) The Only Indian actor to get four national awards and three international awards. 2) Four national awards for the movies Nayagan,Indian,Moonram pirai and Kalathur kannamma. 3) Three South Asian International best film awards for Virumaandi, Swathi muthyam,Saagara sangamam. 4) First actor in Indian cinema whose 7 films made an official entry to Academy Awards(oscar),this itself…
data.text:
1) The Only Indian actor to get four national awards and three international

awards.

2) Four national awards for the movies Nayagan,Indian,Moonram pirai and

Kalathur kannamma.

3) Three South Asian International best film awards for Virumaandi,

Swathi muthyam,Saagara sangamam.

4) First actor in Indian cinema whose 7 films made an official entry

to Academy Awards(oscar),this itself a record.Neither Rajinikanth nor Amitabh,not even Mohan lal or Mammooty.Only kamal did it.

5) First and only actor in Indian cinema to be awarded with 18

filmfare awards.Even dilip kumar has only 14 filmfare awards.

6) Times magazine listed his film “Nayagan” in the top 100 greatest films

ever made.No other south indian actor got that accolade.

7) He was also awarded Fourth Highest Civilian Award in INDIA – the

Padmashree.

8) Recently he was conferred an honorary doctrate by sathyabhama

Deemed university.

9) His self production company raj kamal after giving blockbuster

movie Kuruthi Punal, Apoorva Sagodharargal, Raja Parvai etc declared a

turn over profit of Rs.450 million

10) His dream project Maruda Nayagam was inaugurated by Queen

Elizabeth2.

11) Started a new company raj kamal audio to drive to corporatise

all his film commitments

12) First actor in India to transform his fans club into social

service organisation

13) He and his iyakkam(organisation) has donated 10,000 eye pairs.Kamal distributed

10,000 kg rice to poor , gave free chappels to the needs, and many more.

14) He was offered a huge amount of around 100 crores by a politican to join their

political party but kamal refused it for he says he need to do a lot to Indian cinema. He is simply the best

15) The Only tamil actor who does take tamil movie(without doing remake) to other states and

make it hit.

16) Two andhra state awards

17) 7 or 8 tamil nadu state awards

18) Kalaimamani – by TN Govt

19) Kadhal ilavarasn – by gemini ganesan

20) Puratchi mannan – by K.Balachander

21) Super actor – by panchu arunachalam

22) Kalai gnani – by M.karunanidhi

23) Universal hero – by k.s.ravikumar

24) The Fuel Instrument Engineers (FIE) Foundation, (

Ichalkaranji, Maharashtra ) has conferred “F.I.E” award of Greatest

Indian of our time.Till now only 5 Indians has got it including TATA.

25) Chennai Rotary Club awarded ‘Sirantha Manithar’ award.

26) Conferred Dr. A.T. Kovoor National Award (2004) for Humanist

Activities and Secular Life.The award is instituted by Bharatheeya

Yukthivadi Sangham (Rationalist Association of India ).

27) First actor as a director to lauch the inauguration of film for

the firsttime at Madurai . A remarkable new trend to tamil film

industry whichlauches all its film at chennai.

28) 28) For the first time ever Intel corporation has entered into a

partnership with kamal hassan to introduce and promote digital

entertainment in indian cinemas.Intel is working with only kamal in

india .

29) Only actor in indian cinema to give 5 mega hits in a year 1982

including tamil and hindi

30) Only actor in india who has the courage to act in different

languages and has found success.

31) His film marocharithra ran 1000 days at kavitha theatre in bangalore.

32) Ek duje ke liye is still an all time great film in hindi which

ran for more than 350 days. a remarkable achievement by a tamil

actor & K.Balachander

33) First and only Actor conducted All India Fans Conference at

Coimbatore in 1985.

34) Completed 100 Films at the age of 27.

35) First Actor to donate his body to Madras Medical college after his

life on 15.08.2002.

36) First Indian film “Raja Paarvai” to indroduce animation and

visual effects.

37) First film “Michael Madana Kamarajan” to have Face Morphing

Technology in Tamil Film Industry.

38) First Indian film “Indian” to have make-up men from USA .

39) First Indian film ” Mangamma Sabatham” to have computer graphics

used in a song.

40) First film “Sakalakala Vallavan” to run 1000 continuous

housefull shows in chennai.

41) ” Guna Cave ” name came to that cave in kodaikanal after the film

Guna shooted there.

42) In his life span he has faced minimum of 34 fractures while doing

stunts in films.This shows his dedication to the art.

43) Only actor in the world to have received 171 awards (both

including national and international awards)

44)Only tamil actor to have acted with other legends like MGR ,

sivaji, gemini ganesan,

45) Only actor in the world acting in 10 different roles in one movie in dasavatharam.

45)Still lot more
